column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////And it keeps going and going...with paella. Order paella right away
column2: as it takes quite some time to make. So decide quickly! I'd say that the seafood paella is my least favorite
column3: and either of the other two are about even. Ask if they're serving specialty paellas that day
column4: too. You might get a secret surprise!!
